name: Savola Group Company
description: Savola Group Company, together with its subsidiaries, produces, markets, and distributes food products. It operates through five segments: Food Processing, Retail, Food Services, Frozen Food, and Investments. The company offers sugar, pasta, spices, nuts, pulses, and other food products, as well as sugar, spices, nuts, and pulses. It also engages in the agro cultivation, services and maintenance, retail, trading and distribution, trading and distribution of seafood products, restaurant, renewable energy, e-commerce, and real estate activities, as well as investments in equity-accounted investees and other investments activities. In addition, it retails grocery products through a network of hyper markets, supermarkets, and convenience stores. Savola Group Company was founded in 1978 and is headquartered in Jeddah, the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia.
